data.name: ImpossibleSpecifyDeadlineLessThenToday
data.value: The new deadline must be greater or equal to the current date.

data.name: DeleteDocumentsDialogTitle
data.value: Delete Documents

data.name: DeleteDocumentsDialogText
data.value: Select documents to be deleted.

data.name: DeleteDocumentsDialogAttachments
data.value: Documents

data.name: DeleteDocumentsDialogNoticeAfterDelete
data.value: Documents deleted.

data.name: InstructionStep1
data.value: 1. Make sure that each document of the package is fully captured.

data.name: InstructionStep2
data.value: 2. Repack documents if document pages are mixed, imported by mistake, or have incorrect orientation.

data.name: InstructionStep3
data.value: 3. Open the card of each document. On the “Verification” tab, check the data filled in by the system.

data.name: InstructionStep4
data.value: 4. In the document card, on the “Properties” tab, specify the missing data, for example, the document subject.

data.name: InstructionStep5
data.value: 5. Change the type of documents if required.

data.name: InstructionStep6
data.value: 6. Register the documents if they are subject to registration.

data.name: InstructionStep7
data.value: 7. Send the documents for further processing.

data.name: InvalidDocumentWhenSendInWork
data.value: To send the documents for further processing, fill in the required fields in the document cards.

data.name: InvalidDocumentWhenCompleted
data.value: To complete the assignment, fill in the required fields in the document cards.

data.name: AttachedDocumentsLocked
data.value: Documents from the document package are locked. To repack the documents, close their cards and contents.

data.name: NoDocumentsSuitableForRepacking
data.value: No documents for repacking found. Make sure that you have rights to change the attached documents, and that they are in the PDF format and not encrypted.

data.name: RepackingIsInProgress
data.value: Repacking is in progress. To make changes, go to the document repacking tab.

data.name: SaveAssignmentBeforeRepacking
data.value: To repack documents, save the assignment card.

data.name: NoLicenseToRepacking
data.value: To repack documents, you need a license for the "Intelligence" module.

data.name: ShowRepackingResultsNotification
data.value: Repacking in progress. To view the repacking results, update the assignment card after repacking is completed.

data.name: CompleteWithActiveRepackingSession
data.value: To complete assignment, save your changes on the "Document Repacking" tab. If you don't want to save you changes, close the tab.

data.name: DeleteDocumentsDialogImpossible
data.value: To delete documents, complete repacking and update the assignment card.
